contentrichtext.text: [[File:Mammiferes.jpeg|thumb|''Nouvelle classification des Mammifères'' (1839)]] '''Quaternates''' is an obsolete [[Order (biology)|order]] of [[mammal]]s created by [[Henri-Marie Ducrotay de Blainville]] in 1839, imitating [[Linnean]] nomenclature ([[Primates]]). It included the suborders [[Gravigrada]], [[Pachydermata]], and [[Ruminantia]]. == See also == * [[Secundates]] * [[Tertiates]] ==References== *BLAINVILLE, Henri-Marie Ducrotay de (1839): “Nouvelle classification des Mammifères” in ''Annales Françaises et Etrangères d’Anatomie et de Physiologie Appliquées à la Médicine et à l’Histoire Naturelle'', 3, pp. 268-269 [[Category:Obsolete taxonomic groups]]
